properties.site-address: Kingsbury Hall, Coventry Road, Kingsbury
properties.notes: Vacant Grade II* 16C Manor House currently on Historic Englands Heritage at Risk Register. Residential conversion of the building has commenced. Final repairs and reuse have yet to be achieved. A mixed use application is currently under consideration PAP/2018/0686. Restoration of the historic hall and conversion to 9 apartments. Conversion of existing 19th century barns and inclusion of new infill construction to provide 7 new residential units. Construction of 13 new residential units. Demolition of 20th century bungalow and adjacent barn structure. Consolidation of 19th Century curtain walling
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
